title: is there a freshers event this year?

comments.body: lmfao the current first years are waiting for their freshers party as yet lol
We have a code word for Fresher's Event, it's called ISA 1
LMAO just wait for your expectations to get shattered in the first week

Nope, there is no freshers party/event organized from management side and there will be a mandatory message **cautioning students and parents to be cautious about suspicious freshers party organized by seniors or anyone not from PESU**
